---
title: "HW4"
date: "2024-02-03"
output: pdf_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
rm(list=ls())

temps = read.table("temps.txt", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

flatData = as.vector(unlist(temps[,2:21]))

ts <- ts(flatData, start=1996, frequency=123)

hw1<- HoltWinters(ts, alpha = NULL, beta = NULL, gamma = NULL, seasonal = "multiplicative")

plot(hw1)
plot(hw1$fitted)

tempsSmoothed <- matrix(hw1$fitted[,4], nrow = 123)

write.csv(tempsSmoothed, file = "tempsSmoothed.csv", fileEncoding = "UTF-16LE")



```
